item.title: An Easy Start with Jekyll, for R-Bloggers
item.description: Note (May, 2017): The blogging approach described below has been superceded by the Yihui Xie’s blogdown package. Consult the blogdown repository and the R Studio webinar. I would like my upper-level students to get more practice in writing about their data analysis work (well, to get get more practice in writing, generally). Blogging is one device by which students can be motivated to write carefully, with a particular audience in mind.
